author: ceki
msg: - Added blurb about the Appender.requiresLayout method no longer being needed.

author: ceki
msg: - The Appender.requiresLayout method is no longer needed.
This method was only used by PropertConfigrurator and not
DOMConfigurator nor JoranConfigurator. It was never strictly necessary
and case the layout is *optional* for a given appender type, it causes
This simplification will make it slightly easier to write appender.
